casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eddie CAPLE. No. 437P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2005. Paul F. Herzog, Fayetteville, for Eddie Caple. L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of August 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of August 2005."
